amendment.description: An amendment numbered 19 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to prohibit funding for Ukraine.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 70 - 342 (Roll no. 307).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 70 - 342 (Roll no. 307).
